# PPT 스타일 [\^xaringan-tutorial] {#xaringan-style}

```{r ppt-style}
library(tidyverse)
library(magick)
library(sysfonts)
font_add_google("Noto Sans KR")
# library(extrafont)
# loadfonts()

template_img <- image_blank(width = 400, height = 500, color = "darkgray", pseudo_image = "", defines = NULL)

template_img %>% 
  image_annotate("Typography", location = "+30+30", size = 20, font = "NanumGothic", color = "black") %>% 
  image_annotate("Aa가", location = "+30+50", size = 30, font = "Noto Sans KR", color = "black")
  


```
